LABEL: 0x1D3
STRING: It must have been two whole days since the <SHEEP III> fell to the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x216
STRING: The ship, sitting alone on the sea floor, was no different from the day before.

LABEL: 0x254
STRING: It had a distinctive presence on the desolate seabed.

LABEL: 0x30D
STRING: It was huge.

LABEL: 0x323
STRING: I climbed down the ramp and suddenly turned around.

LABEL: 0x351
STRING: When I spent my time inside the submarine―and only in the front section at that―I felt a sense of inadequacy and claustrophobia,

LABEL: 0x391
STRING: like I was living in a small student dormitory with no one out in the open...

LABEL: 0x3F3
STRING: I had now changed my mind and realized that I was being totally naive.

LABEL: 0x425
STRING: To think such a massive man-made object could reach the depths of the sea... It was abnormal.

LABEL: 0x47B
STRING: It was all thanks to the technology of ROMLES――

LABEL: 0x4A9
STRING: This accident would probably force a review of deep-sea cruises using the <SHEEP III>, which was planned to be open to the public.

LABEL: 0x518
STRING: I shouldn't be here in a place like this, after all.

LABEL: 0x548
STRING: I had to hurry back... And for that――

LABEL: 0x574
STRING: I turned around and started walking.

LABEL: 0x601
STRING: 「Now then...」

LABEL: 0x61B
STRING: I started walking aimlessly, but there was no point in getting too far away from the ship.

LABEL: 0x66A
STRING: I walked around the hull a decent distance away.

LABEL: 0x6B6
STRING: Unlike the other day, when I walked toward the rear section, visibility wasn't that bad.

LABEL: 0x700
STRING: The sand seemed to have mostly settled down.

LABEL: 0x72A
STRING: Using my infrared vision, I could see a few dozen meters ahead.

LABEL: 0x76C
STRING: At this rate, I wouldn't have much trouble exploring――

LABEL: 0x807
STRING: 「――Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x823
STRING: I tripped over something, lost my footing, and collapsed on the spot.

LABEL: 0x859
STRING: Thanks to the water, I slowly held out my hands and caught myself.

LABEL: 0x89F
STRING: ...Okay, I'm fine.

LABEL: 0x8C1
STRING: I put strength into my arms, slowly stood up, and tried to look at my feet when I noticed something.

LABEL: 0x90F
STRING: That's right―I couldn't see my feet in this diving suit because of its structure.

LABEL: 0x94B
STRING: I wondered what I tripped over...

LABEL: 0x973
STRING: I put some distance between us, crouched down, and peered at it.

LABEL: 0xA06
STRING: 「What's this...?」

LABEL: 0xA24
STRING: There was a giant steel plate lying there, half buried.

LABEL: 0xA6E
STRING: What the hell was that?

LABEL: 0xA88
STRING: It was too old to be one of the parts of the <Isle of Wind> that were falling just a moment ago.

LABEL: 0xACE
STRING: In which case, it must be much older―and it soon occurred to me.

LABEL: 0xB18
STRING: I see. Seven years ago――

LABEL: 0xB3D
STRING: It was probably ballast from a sunken submarine.

LABEL: 0xB69
STRING: Were the weights that had been cut off during the return of the first <SHEEP> still lying here?

LABEL: 0xBBE
STRING: It was slowly rusting from its edges, buried in the seabed and becoming a part of it. It was losing its artificial appearance.

LABEL: 0xC2A
STRING: Thus, it was forgotten―all of it.

LABEL: 0xC5C
STRING: The effort that should have been there, the time that should have been spent...

LABEL: 0xC9C
STRING: Nothing was left.

LABEL: 0xCBA
STRING: There was nothing left after the sinking.

LABEL: 0xCDE
STRING: ――But, was that really true?

LABEL: 0xF76
STRING: I walked around for a while.

LABEL: 0xF96
STRING: Thanks to the buoyancy, my diving suit wasn't particularly heavy, and I could move however I wanted.

LABEL: 0xFE6
STRING: That said, my stamina was quickly being drained away thanks to the airtight nature of the suit.

LABEL: 0x1032
STRING: I couldn't take too long. And, just then...

LABEL: 0x1076
STRING: Before my eyes, bubbles were rising up from the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x10AA
STRING: ――It was ozone.

LABEL: 0x10CC
STRING: Poisonous gas with a powerful oxidizing effect.

LABEL: 0x1157
STRING: Ozone reminded me of an earth history class I'd taken in high school.

LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: On the ancient earth, life was first born in the sea.

LABEL: 0x1236
STRING: But the creatures that were born couldn't go up to the surface right away.

LABEL: 0x1282
STRING: Direct exposure to ultraviolet rays pouring down on them was a threat that would destroy their DNA.

LABEL: 0x12D3
STRING: The creation of the ozone layer absorbed those harmful rays and allowed living organisms to expand to the surface.

LABEL: 0x133F
STRING: The creatures that expanded their activities to the surface increased in variety explosively.

LABEL: 0x1387
STRING: While ozone promoted evolution, it was also toxic to all living things.

LABEL: 0x1426
STRING: A cage of ozone.

LABEL: 0x144A
STRING: We were trapped at the bottom of Mother Sea,

LABEL: 0x147A
STRING: and now we were trying to escape from here using that "cage."

LABEL: 0x1535
STRING: Tracing along the base of the bubbles,

LABEL: 0x155D
STRING: I caught sight of what looked like a severed hose.

LABEL: 0x1591
STRING: Continuous bubbles were generated from the mouth of the hose as it emerged from the seafloor.

LABEL: 0x15DB
STRING: When I lifted the hose lightly to trace its end, it seemed to be firmly buried in the sand and mud.

LABEL: 0x163B
STRING: According to Tokiwa――

LABEL: 0x165B
STRING: A main tube for pumping ozone to the seafloor was lowered from the <Isle of Wind>,

LABEL: 0x16B1
STRING: which would then be divided into multiple smaller tubes.

LABEL: 0x1715
STRING: Which meant...

LABEL: 0x1735
STRING: I raised my head a little and surveyed the area.

LABEL: 0x1761
STRING: I could see several similar hoses in my surroundings.

LABEL: 0x17A5
STRING: I was sure that the same was true on the other side, where my view was cut off.

LABEL: 0x17E3
STRING: This was the ozone cage...

LABEL: 0x1807
STRING: When I turned around, I saw the <SHEEP III's> massive body lying there.

LABEL: 0x183C
STRING: I had to pull this all the way to the ship and pump it full of ozone.

LABEL: 0x18DA
STRING: 「All right...!」

LABEL: 0x18F6
STRING: I grabbed hold of the hose again, this time pulling as hard as I could.

LABEL: 0x194E
STRING: This was harder than I thought... I lifted it up, but I guess it was impossible to go by force like this.

LABEL: 0x19A8
STRING: I revised my strategy and dug up the sand mud at the base of the hose.

LABEL: 0x19E2
STRING: It should be a little easier to carry if I cleared away the sand and exposed it more...

LABEL: 0x1A30
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x1ABD
STRING: 「...Is going to be hard, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x1ADD
STRING: As if I were diligently weeding, I sat down and shoveled away the sand and mud.

LABEL: 0x1B27
STRING: As I dug deeper, the hose itself wasn't buried very deep, but it looked to be fairly long horizontally to make up for that.

LABEL: 0x1B8F
STRING: It was steady work that made you want to chant "Essahoisa."

LABEL: 0x1BC9
STRING: An escape by an ozone explosion! Even during the most spectacular operations, preliminary preparations were usually something like this.

LABEL: 0x1C45
STRING: I continued my work in silence.

LABEL: 0x1C69
STRING: Everyone was waiting―there was no time to play around.

LABEL: 0x1CA7
STRING: ...It was quiet.

LABEL: 0x1CC1
STRING: Loneliness assaulted me suddenly.

LABEL: 0x1CE3
STRING: They said that people felt lonely only when they were surrounded by society, but what a surprise.

LABEL: 0x1D31
STRING: Truly, I felt no sign of anyone―what could be more solitary?

LABEL: 0x1DED
STRING: ...Did I hear something just now?

LABEL: 0x1E0F
STRING: I turned around.

LABEL: 0x1E84
STRING: There was no one there.

LABEL: 0x1EB8
STRING: No. Don't think too hard about it.

LABEL: 0x1F63
STRING: While frantically moving my hands, my thoughts continued to spin around and around pointlessly.

LABEL: 0x1FAF
STRING: My breathing naturally quickened.

LABEL: 0x1FD3
STRING: Several ghost stories popped into my head.

LABEL: 0x1FFD
STRING: We'd already surpassed common sense.

LABEL: 0x2029
STRING: It would no longer be strange for anything to happen in this sea, where bizarre creatures lived.

LABEL: 0x2075
STRING: There have been countless scary stories about the sea since ancient times.

LABEL: 0x20AD
STRING: In those days, when the world wasn't as connected as it is today,

LABEL: 0x20F1
STRING: the other side of the ocean and the bottom of the sea must have been even more unknown and terrifying than they were today.

LABEL: 0x2149
STRING: It was easy to dismiss the many theories born from them as a product of delusions.

LABEL: 0x21A5
STRING: But... was it okay to dismiss all of them out of hand?

LABEL: 0x21F3
STRING: That the legend of something lurking in this darkness was all nonsense..?.

LABEL: 0x224B
STRING: A grotesque monster beyond human comprehension lurking at the bottom of a silent sea...

LABEL: 0x2285
STRING: Or, perhaps an intelligent lifeform we had never encountered before.

LABEL: 0x22B3
STRING: Even now, they were watching me from somewhere far away―no, from very close by――

LABEL: 0x2307
STRING: ――*Tap*

LABEL: 0x237C
STRING: 「Uoaaah!」

LABEL: 0x239C
STRING: I turned around on the spot, still crouched down.

LABEL: 0x23DC
STRING: Someone... just now... tapped me on the shoulder.

LABEL: 0x240C
STRING: Who was it?

LABEL: 0x2422
STRING: Was I about to be eaten?

LABEL: 0x244C
STRING: That was not an option.

LABEL: 0x2470
STRING: I had to defeat them somehow, go back, and tell everyone――

LABEL: 0x2509
STRING: ――And.

LABEL: 0x251F
STRING: Looking over, I saw a familiar-looking pressure-resistant diving suit in front of me.

LABEL: 0x255D
STRING: It was the same kind that I was wearing.

LABEL: 0x258B
STRING: Raising one hand next to their face, they waved the palm of their hand in greeting,

LABEL: 0x25D1
STRING: then pointed at their wrist with the other.

LABEL: 0x25FF
STRING: I looked down at my wrist―Ah, the transceiver.

LABEL: 0x2645
STRING: I flipped the switch.

LABEL: 0x2694
STRING: 『Did I surprise you?』

LABEL: 0x26B0
STRING: 『It's me. I came to help.』

LABEL: 0x26D9
STRING: ...It was in shockingly bad taste.

LABEL: 0x2707
STRING: I calmed my breathing and fixed my loud palpitations.

LABEL: 0x274B
STRING: 「Don't scare me like that...」

LABEL: 0x277A
STRING: 『Come on, that wasn't my intention.』

LABEL: 0x27A8
STRING: 『You looked very focused. Sorry if I startled you.』

LABEL: 0x27F5
STRING: 「No, that was definitely on purpose.」

LABEL: 0x282A
STRING: 『I won't deny it.』

LABEL: 0x284D
STRING: I couldn't believe Hiragino's voice sounded so reproachful as he laughed.

LABEL: 0x2893
STRING: Damn it... I'd definitely get back at him someday.

LABEL: 0x28D8
STRING: 『What do you think, Hiragino-sensei?』

LABEL: 0x2907
STRING: After a small noise, I could hear Yukari's voice.

LABEL: 0x2939
STRING: Her slightly muffled voice through the microphone was exactly the same as it had been back then.

LABEL: 0x2987
STRING: I bet she'd get mad if I said something about how nostalgic this felt.

LABEL: 0x29D4
STRING: 『Sure enough, he was focused on his work.』

LABEL: 0x2A04
STRING: 『Katagiri-kun is connected now, too.』

LABEL: 0x2A45
STRING: 『Thank you.』

LABEL: 0x2A6B
STRING: 『Katagiri-san...』

LABEL: 0x2A8E
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x2B1D
STRING: 『Is that all you have to say?!』

LABEL: 0x2B77
STRING: The automatic volume adjustment couldn't keep up with her sudden loud voice.

LABEL: 0x2BAF
STRING: I immediately tried to cover my ears, but there was no point while wearing this diving suit.

LABEL: 0x2C00
STRING: 『You! Why do you always want to be alone like that?!』

LABEL: 0x2C56
STRING: 『You're in a diving suit! Connect the radio!』

LABEL: 0x2C82
STRING: 『I was wondering what was going on with you because you never responded to our calls...』

LABEL: 0x2CCB
STRING: 「Sorry for worrying you.」

LABEL: 0x2CFE
STRING: 『Honestly. I don't care what happens to you, but...』

LABEL: 0x2D52
STRING: 『It'll hinder our operation, too! Think a little!』

LABEL: 0x2DA5
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x2DD4
STRING: 『Haah... So, give me a status report.』

LABEL: 0x2E0C
STRING: 『Oh, before we get to that...』

LABEL: 0x2E2C
STRING: 『Go tell that idiot over there who turned off his radio to turn it back on.』

LABEL: 0x2E81
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x2E97
STRING: I looked over to see Hiragino inspecting the hose at his feet,

LABEL: 0x2EE1
STRING: looking nonchalant even as I was being yelled at.

LABEL: 0x2F0B
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x2F34
STRING: 『Ah, are you done?』

LABEL: 0x2F5B
STRING: This guy...

LABEL: 0x2F73
STRING: After reporting the current situation to Yukari, Hiragino and I continued our work.

LABEL: 0x3020
STRING: 『So you were planning on doing this by yourself...』

LABEL: 0x305B
STRING: As he spoke, Hiragino lowered his hips and pulled on the hose.

LABEL: 0x3097
STRING: He should've had more stamina than me, but he didn't seem used to working while wearing a diving suit yet.

LABEL: 0x30ED
STRING: Still, the two of us should be able to handle this.

LABEL: 0x3176
STRING: Unlike the solitary work that I had done earlier,

LABEL: 0x31CF
STRING: we quickly dug up the hose, carried it with us, and twisted it into the damaged exterior wall of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x321A
STRING: 「One isn't enough. We need to gather at least 20 of them to pour ozone through.」

LABEL: 0x326A
STRING: 「By the way, Hiragino-san, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x32A9
STRING: 『Yeah...』

LABEL: 0x32C8
STRING: Hiragino put his hands on his knees and looked rather pained.

LABEL: 0x32F6
STRING: This was his first time doing any out-of-ship activity. He might not be suited for it, and all this heavy lifting sure didn't help, either.

LABEL: 0x336D
STRING: 『I'll never get used to this diving suit.』

LABEL: 0x33A6
STRING: 「Really? I seem to be moving a lot better than I did at first.」

LABEL: 0x33FD
STRING: 『I mean, it's not good to hear voices in your ear.』

LABEL: 0x3441
STRING: 『Momoi's voice gets incredibly loud when she gets angry... I have no idea how she generates that kind of volume while being such a pipsqueak.』

LABEL: 0x34F5
STRING: 『Don't worry, I've turned off the radio to the wheelhouse.』

LABEL: 0x3532
STRING: Hiragino tapped his helmet.

LABEL: 0x3560
STRING: The smug look on his face through the glass was annoying.

LABEL: 0x359B
STRING: 『Right now, we're only communicating with each other.』

LABEL: 0x3857
STRING: 『There's something I wanted to talk to you about.』

LABEL: 0x3884
STRING: Hiragino's voice reached my ears as I continued my work.

LABEL: 0x3919
STRING: 「What about?」

LABEL: 0x3942
STRING: 『I know I shouldn't have any weird expectations, but...』

LABEL: 0x398F
STRING: He hesitated.

LABEL: 0x39AB
STRING: You brought it up, so out with it.

LABEL: 0x39DF
STRING: I waited for his next words while pulling the hose.

LABEL: 0x3A44
STRING: 『Seven years ago.』

LABEL: 0x3A64
STRING: 『I talked about how we couldn't save the ozone-poisoned Ryuuzen.』

LABEL: 0x3AA7
STRING: 「Right.」

LABEL: 0x3ACC
STRING: 『He wasn't the only patient brought in at that time.』

LABEL: 0x3B08
STRING: 『Along with Ryuuzen, there was another patient who was brought in.』

LABEL: 0x3B4C
STRING: 『That person was infected with <Alice>, just like the deceased Ryuuzen.』

LABEL: 0x3BB5
STRING: A patient infected with <Alice> was brought in along with Ryuuzen seven years ago――

LABEL: 0x3BF9
STRING: I did my best to continue my work in silence.

LABEL: 0x3C38
STRING: 『As I said before, <Alice> isn't a lethal virus.』

LABEL: 0x3C82
STRING: 『Ryuuzen couldn't be saved, but...』

LABEL: 0x3CC0
STRING: 『The other patient with <Alice>...』

LABEL: 0x3CEE
STRING: 『If I remember correctly――』

LABEL: 0x3D20
STRING: 『――They didn't die.』

LABEL: 0x3D67
STRING: My hands stopped moving.

LABEL: 0x3D8D
STRING: One of them was dead, and the other was asleep.

LABEL: 0x3DB9
STRING: <Alice> wasn't a lethal virus.

LABEL: 0x3DED
STRING: Ryuuzen Haruki died of ozone poisoning.

LABEL: 0x3E17
STRING: Other than the fact that she had "died," I had gotten no other information about my sister――

LABEL: 0x3E55
STRING: 「You can't be serious――」

LABEL: 0x3E9A
STRING: 『The survivor from the <SHEEP> accident...』

LABEL: 0x3F36
STRING: 『I think that it wasn't Ryuuzen, but your sister... Katagiri Hitose.』

LABEL: 0x3F94
STRING: 『If I told Yukari about this, I'd end up telling her the truth, so I kept quiet...』

LABEL: 0x3FFB
STRING: 「Nee-san is――」

LABEL: 0x4019
STRING: Alive?

LABEL: 0x4035
STRING: Was that even possible?

LABEL: 0x405F
STRING: For the past seven years――

LABEL: 0x407A
STRING: I came to ROMLES to find out the truth about her death, boarded the <SHEEP III>, and then――

LABEL: 0x40DB
STRING: It was all for that reason.

LABEL: 0x40FF
STRING: It was only reported that she was dead,

LABEL: 0x412F
STRING: and the information was mostly covered up, so nothing was disclosed.

LABEL: 0x416B
STRING: That was why I was trying to expose all of it on my own.

LABEL: 0x41AB
STRING: My sister wasn't dead...?

LABEL: 0x41DD
STRING: I suddenly raised my head and looked at Hiragino carrying the hose in the distance.

LABEL: 0x4219
STRING: He didn't seem to notice me standing upright and continued his work.

LABEL: 0x42C1
STRING: 『It's just a possibility.』

LABEL: 0x42F7
STRING: 『Nothing more, nothing less.』

LABEL: 0x4327
STRING: 『Even if she's alive, she's most likely been informed that you, her own brother, are dead.』

LABEL: 0x437F
STRING: 『Probably not in a proper way.』

LABEL: 0x43AB
STRING: 『I have no idea how they'd treat her, their precious living <Alice> sample.』

LABEL: 0x440F
STRING: 『In the unlikely event that you did meet...』

LABEL: 0x4439
STRING: 『No, there's no proof that she's still alive in the first place.』

LABEL: 0x4498
STRING: Infected by <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x44BA
STRING: The same as Hikari.

LABEL: 0x44DA
STRING: How much effort had Reiri put into getting her out?

LABEL: 0x4516
STRING: How many people had been mobilized to search for her when she ran away?

LABEL: 0x4560
STRING: Given that, my sister could be going through anything.

LABEL: 0x45AC
STRING: But―thinking about it the other way around, they probably wouldn't kill their precious <Alice> carrier so easily.

LABEL: 0x4614
STRING: Whatever the case, there was a good chance that she was still alive.

LABEL: 0x4662
STRING: 「...Why are you telling me this?」

LABEL: 0x4699
STRING: 『I said I'd help, didn't I?』

LABEL: 0x46C5
STRING: 『You walked out with a look on your face like you were ready to die.』

LABEL: 0x4719
STRING: 『...People who don't have hope are frightening.』

LABEL: 0x4754
STRING: Hiragino boasted.

LABEL: 0x477B
STRING: 『Come on, your hands have stopped moving.』

LABEL: 0x47A5
STRING: 『We're almost there.』

LABEL: 0x47C6
STRING: And so our work continued.

LABEL: 0x47EA
STRING: Eventually, we managed to collect more than 20 broken hoses.

LABEL: 0x4A9E
STRING: The dark water between the outer wall and the pressure-resistant shell.

LABEL: 0x4ACA
STRING: Ozone bubbles were rising up through it.

LABEL: 0x4AF8
STRING: Poisonous bubbles――

LABEL: 0x4B12
STRING: A cage that cut off a narrow area of the sea from the outside world and transformed it into another world.

LABEL: 0x4B52
STRING: Small bubbles spewed out continuously.

LABEL: 0x4B7E
STRING: Multiple bubbles solidified,

LABEL: 0x4BA0
STRING: grew larger,

LABEL: 0x4BBE
STRING: and broke apart,

LABEL: 0x4BDE
STRING: acting as if they were alive.

LABEL: 0x4C10
STRING: It was like cell division.

LABEL: 0x4C38
STRING: Even as I stared at it, the gas continued to cover the pressure-resistant shell.

LABEL: 0x4C72
STRING: 「Speaking of which, the bomb――」

LABEL: 0x4CA9
STRING: 『I have it with me, of course.』

LABEL: 0x4CD4
STRING: Hiragino then pulled out a small box.

LABEL: 0x4D04
STRING: I reached out and took it.

LABEL: 0x4D2E
STRING: 「I'll go set it up, so please wait for me.」

LABEL: 0x4D7F
STRING: 『Yeah, I'll leave it to you.』

LABEL: 0x4DA2
STRING: With a hose in hand, I ducked inside through the exterior wall.

LABEL: 0x4E3D
STRING: It was dark――

LABEL: 0x4E53
STRING: In reality, there shouldn't be much difference in brightness compared to the outside, but...

LABEL: 0x4E99
STRING: Or rather, it was all infrared vision in the first place――

LABEL: 0x4ECF
STRING: The fact was that the walls separating this space created a completely different atmosphere from the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x4F2F
STRING: In the middle of the outer wall I'd entered through, I looked up and saw the bridge several meters above me.

LABEL: 0x4F7B
STRING: 「There...」

LABEL: 0x4F99
STRING: Fortunately, there was a framework-like structure between the outer wall and the pressure-resistant shell.

LABEL: 0x4FE9
STRING: I was afraid of putting too much weight on it since it was sunken,

LABEL: 0x5057
STRING: but nevertheless, I used it as a foothold to walk on.

LABEL: 0x50E6
STRING: 「Hup!」

LABEL: 0x50FC
STRING: A black fish passed by in front of me.

LABEL: 0x5128
STRING: Inside this submarine, which was nothing more than an artificial object...

LABEL: 0x5154
STRING: Deep-sea fish were swimming here as well, an area where no one could visit...

LABEL: 0x51A2
STRING: It was like experiencing the inside of a sunken ship.

LABEL: 0x51DE
STRING: ...Actually, that was exactly what this was.

LABEL: 0x520C
STRING: I was momentarily captivated by the somewhat fantastic sight.

LABEL: 0x52A7
STRING: 「Right――」

LABEL: 0x52C1
STRING: I attached the small box right under the bridge.

LABEL: 0x52FB
STRING: Reiri's homemade detonator. To think that she made this out of a PDA... A truly terrifying high schooler.

LABEL: 0x5354
STRING: I gathered some ozone and enveloped the box in bubbles...

LABEL: 0x5394
STRING: 「――This should do it.」

LABEL: 0x5632
STRING: I descended from the bridge back to the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x566A
STRING: The vast, wide sea... Hiragino was facing the <SHEEP III> with his eyes closed and his hands clasped together.

LABEL: 0x56C3
STRING: Just like when Tokiwa had prayed to the stars――

LABEL: 0x570F
STRING: I was about to call out to him, but stopped myself.

LABEL: 0x573F
STRING: The two spheres were side by side, joined by a narrow bridge.

LABEL: 0x5779
STRING: On one side, a great many people had lost their lives.

LABEL: 0x579F
STRING: On the other side, there were survivors.

LABEL: 0x57C5
STRING: Hiragino was praying right in the middle, without leaning either way.

LABEL: 0x5868
STRING: ――His prayer was not just for the lost lives.

LABEL: 0x58A2
STRING: It was for the many dead, but also for the survivors...

LABEL: 0x591A
STRING: Hiragino slowly opened his eyes.

LABEL: 0x5955
STRING: 「――Let's go back. Everyone's waiting for us.」
